page.title: 09School Journey from Wimbish
page.content: On 11th May some of the children went to{Pwllheli}in North Wales for an activity week. We shared chalets for our rooms. We spent 6 days in the holiday camp. During this time we went to castles, slate mines and a rabbit ranch where we could handle the rabbits and feed the lambs. We also took part in a number of activities. They were; absailing, archery, badminton, boating, fencing, judo, gymnastics, team games and table tennis. We had our meals in a very large dining hall; we had breakfast, lunch and dinner. In the evenings we could choose between disco, swimming, television or a film. We could have soup at 8.30.p.m. We had a meeting before bed to go through what we had done and to hear about the next day. Then we went to bed at 10 p.m.
